title: i got 287/300 in my PCM. how many marks should i get in KCET for a sub-700 rank?
content: cuz i need 700 rank to get into BMS CSE stream. i could ask the r/bmsce sub but its dead so...

comments.body: Over 150/180 would be your best bet.
I got around 700 rank in 1989 and could only get mechanical at BMSce. Looks like things are a bit easier nowadays
And I got 255/300 in pcm cbse and around 140/180 in cet those days
My friend had a rank around 700, he had around 290 in PCM and around 140 in the exam. So 145+ should be the the sweet spot
my friend 298 in pcm and 114/180 covid time got into bms cse
